title: Marketing + Operations Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Porchlight
Interview Descriptions:
From outside the area, a series of over the phone interviews...mostly the routine, but also including some pretty different exercises (the most memorable being a LENGTHY round of word associations).

Notes on the process:
- the interviews themselves weren't terrible, even with the odd exercises whose focus was understandably to get to know candidates' personalities
- there was, however, a lot of unprofessionalism. Management was very poor with explaining their end of things, answering questions, and justifying decisions. More than anything, they contacted several references BEFORE the final interview (nonetheless a job offer, which they didn't ultimately make).
- I'll note that all staff I'd talked with at that time seems to have left since then as well
Interview Questions:
What's the first thing that comes to mind when I say the word:
One example, "funny".  Not all were that bad.
